kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id:errors' contains exact text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 084 234 5678, or 081.234.5678'.

The text of element 'id:errors' should have been 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 084 234 5678, or 081.234.5678' but it was 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., xxx-xxx-xxxx, xxx xxx xxxx, or xxx.xxx.xxxx'.
